titles.title: Private Officers Protection Act of 1998
To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide penalties for murders of armored car crew members.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

bill.summary: 2/24/1998--Introduced. Private Officers Protection Act of 1998 - Amends the Federal criminal code to provide that whoever, in or affecting commerce, kills or attempts to kill an armored car crew member shall be subject to Federal penalties prescribed for murder, manslaughter, and attempted murder or manslaughter.
